title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 10:40  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 10:48  
xwiki-bridge - (10:48): news  
xwiki-bridge - (10:49): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: ok  
xwiki-bridge - (10:49): [tmortagne] things is EntityReference is not always extended and is supposed to be able to leave alone so we need EntityReference extractReference(EntityType type) anyway  
xwiki-bridge - (10:49): [tmortagne] a typed one will have to make sure the class is right and sometime create it  
xwiki-bridge left at 11:34 (  
xwiki-bridge joined #xwiki at 11:35  
xwiki-bridge - (12:03): [hoani.cross] Hi guys  
xwiki-bridge - (12:03): [Vincent Massol] hi hoani  
xwiki-bridge - (12:03): [hoani.cross] if you want to see something cool using XWiki, see this : https://pf.globotraders-tahiti.com/kiaora-ng/  
xwiki-bridge - (12:04): [hoani.cross] slideshow integration in top banner (js powered) with soft border with the background image :)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:05): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: nice, hope you can get us some good price to go there on holidays! :)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:05): [hoani.cross] for the next wiki days :)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:06): [Vincent Massol] I can do support for xwiki for free if I'm invited there  
xwiki-bridge - (12:06): [Vincent Massol] ;)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:07): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: fyi you're missing an image on https://pf.globotraders-tahiti.com/kiaora-ng/bin/view/Activities/  
xwiki-bridge - (12:08): [hoani.cross] I saw thx  
xwiki-bridge - (12:08): [Vincent Massol] (it's nice to be able to put images in section titles)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:08): [hoani.cross] yes but it breaks using them in html header title  
xwiki-bridge - (12:08): [hoani.cross] you would get <img... in the window title  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [Vincent Massol] yes, it's a known pb  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [Vincent Massol] It's a bug  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [hoani.cross] yes cauz it works for breadcrums  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [Vincent Massol] the plain text renderer should not output them  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [hoani.cross] image removed  
xwiki-bridge - (12:09): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne would know more about it  
xwiki-bridge - (12:10): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: the site is a bit slow, is it normal?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:10): [Vincent Massol] is it because it's on your own machine   
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [Vincent Massol] or because it's not been tuned yet?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [hoani.cross] it because it's hosted in French Polynesia  
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [hoani.cross] I am FAR from you guys :)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [Vincent Massol] so it's because xwiki has too many requests  
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [Vincent Massol] (too many round trips)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:11): [hoani.cross] but a 320Gbit cable is currently being installed to hawai right now  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: the plain text renderer should not output what ? image ?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [hoani.cross] it will operate in june 2010  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: we had this issue reported already. In window title, you get the html in text output  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [Vincent Massol] (when you use html in titles)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [tmortagne] then the plain text renderer is not used  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [Vincent Massol] ok it's something else then  
xwiki-bridge - (12:12): [tmortagne] it's not a plain text renderer bug  
xwiki-bridge - (12:13): [Vincent Massol] do you remember if we have a jira ofr it thomas?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:13): [tmortagne] no, i don't even remember this issue actually  
xwiki-bridge - (12:13): [Vincent Massol] hmm I was sure we talked about it here or on the list  
xwiki-bridge - (12:13): [Vincent Massol] (and I even thought you were taking care of it ;))  
xwiki-bridge - (12:14): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: for https://pf.globotraders-tahiti.com/kiaora-ng/bin/view/Photos/ have you used the photo album app as is or have you had to modify it?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:14): [hoani.cross] photo album app delivered but somewhat modified to support i18n  
xwiki-bridge - (12:15): [hoani.cross] my real problem is the blog app  
xwiki-bridge - (12:15): [hoani.cross] mostly because it's xwiki1.0 syntax mostly  
xwiki-bridge - (12:15): [Vincent Massol] ok so that's fixed already  
xwiki-bridge - (12:16): [hoani.cross] and to properly support i18n, I created 4 blogs (one per language)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:16): [hoani.cross] since object do not have (yet?) i18n fields  
xwiki-bridge - (12:16): [Vincent Massol] yes it's not there for objects  
xwiki-bridge - (12:16): [Vincent Massol] several blogs is the good solution  
xwiki-bridge - (12:16): [Vincent Massol] it's actually possibly better than a single blog  
xwiki-bridge - (12:17): [Vincent Massol] since you may not always have translations available for all blog posts  
xwiki-bridge - (12:17): [Vincent Massol] and most of the time you wouldn't want to see untranslated entries  
xwiki-bridge - (12:17): [hoani.cross] yes and because different languages are associated to different cultures, no all populations cares about all blog posts  
xwiki-bridge - (12:17): [Vincent Massol] yep  
xwiki-bridge - (12:18): [hoani.cross] I saw that advantage and used it to sell the fact to my client (the presence of 4 blogs)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:18): [hoani.cross] but I get trouble with images to be included in the blog panel when I use them in summaries  
xwiki-bridge - (12:19): [hoani.cross] coz it's xwiki1.0, on a xwiki2.0 doc, i get {{html}}... displayed in the blog panel  
xwiki-bridge - (12:19): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: i found http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XAADMINISTRATION-51 but it's fixed and i checked, by default the plain text renderer is used for head title  
xwiki-bridge - (12:19): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: do you know what XE version it corresponds to?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [tmortagne] searching  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [Vincent Massol] seraching too  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [Vincent Massol] seems qiute old  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [hoani.cross] one more thing, tags are NOT i18n and it's impossible to dedicated tags to one language, right  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [hoani.cross] ?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:20): [tmortagne] pretty sure it's not included in 2.0.2  
xwiki-bridge - (12:21): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: it is  
xwiki-bridge - (12:21): [Vincent Massol] 2.0.2 uses 1.18  
xwiki-bridge - (12:21): [Vincent Massol] (according to http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise202)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:21): [tmortagne] yes it seems  
xwiki-bridge - (12:22): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: hmmm right  
xwiki-bridge - (12:22): [tmortagne] note the code is in XWikiPreferences  
xwiki-bridge - (12:22): [Vincent Massol] ah  
xwiki-bridge - (12:22): [tmortagne] so maybe a upgrade issue or it simply has been chganged  
xwiki-bridge - (12:22): [Vincent Massol] hoani.cross: could you check that?  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [hoani.cross] I change my xwiki window title bar to '$tdoc.displayTitle - $msg.get("kiaora.website.title")' and now look at the result on https://pf.globotraders-tahiti.com/kiaora%2Dng/bin/view/Accommodation/ for example  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [tmortagne] you should have  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [tmortagne] $tdoc.getRenderedTitle("plain/1.0") ($doc.fullName) - XWiki  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [tmortagne] ok that's why then  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [tmortagne] $tdoc.displayTitle peoduce html  
xwiki-bridge - (12:23): [tmortagne] produce  
xwiki-bridge - (12:24): [hoani.cross] you rulez  
xwiki-bridge - (12:24): [hoani.cross] it works  
xwiki-bridge - (12:24): [hoani.cross] in japanese too, :)  
xwiki-bridge - (12:24): [tmortagne] :)
